Service.Title: Axon population generator
Service.Description: Combines a simulated axon population and neural interface geometry to simulate extracellular recording
Service.CLI: simulate_nerve_recording axons.mat fields.mat s_pop_activity f_pop_activity fs

Inputs.Name: fields.mat
Inputs.Label: interface geometry
Inputs.Description: simulated extracellular fields as generated by "module-EIDORS-Ve"

Inputs.Name: s_pop_activity
Inputs.Label: population activity
Inputs.Description: String specification for population activity, see <link>. If a file is supplied, this input is ignored. Examples: flat[0.2,2] generates epochs with 0.2 and 2 imp/s/axon. burst[0.1,30,1; 0.1,30,10]_r5 simulates 5 replicates of population bursts at t=0 to a peak of 30 imp/s/axon from a baseline activitly level of 0.1 imp/s/axon with widths of 1 and 10 ms (5 replicates).

Inputs.Name: f_pop_activity
Inputs.Label: population activity (file)
Inputs.Description: Population activity file with a specified pattern of spike-times and units. .mat, .json, and .xml file formats are supported

Outputs.Name: nerve recording
Outputs.Label: simulated recordings
Outputs.Description: 100ms simulated nerve recording epochs, seperated by source axon population and fascicle.
